headlines.description: David Silva scored one goal and made two more as Manchester City put on a passing masterclass to overwhelm Newcastle United.

video.headline: Burley: Newcastle 'lied down and were splattered' by Man City

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL FCTV (Burley: Newcastle's ‘lied down and were splattered’ by Man City) 2020/7/8 GLOBAL

headlines.shortLinkText: Silva leads Man City in easy win over Newcastle

headlines.description: John Egan's stoppage-time header earned Sheffield United a dramatic 1-0 Premier League victory over Wolverhampton Wanderers at Bramall Lane.
headlines.shortLinkText: Last-gasp Egan header earns Sheffield United win over Wolves

headlines.description: West Ham United's hopes of climbing clear of the Premier League relegation zone suffered a blow as a Jay Rodriguez header gave Burnley a 1-0 win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Burnley push West Ham back into relegation danger

headlines.description: Liverpool won at Brighton 3-1 to inch closer to the Premier League record for points in a season on Wednesday.

video.headline: Liverpool need a squad 'refresh' in the summer window

tracking.trackingName: Liverpool need a squad 'refresh' in the summer window

headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool inch closer to points record with win
